comments.content: |S| doesn’t match Jan, come to that neither does the |D|.

Yes, you are right. But the |Z| does ;-)  
Could be customized Alternate Gothic No 2.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/alternate-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/alternate-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/alternate-gothic/")

With a bit of customization (mainly extending /S finials and /E crossbar), [Korolev Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/korolev/) is not so far too (right /Z and /D ;) but /S and /8 a bit off).
